paper_abstract: In commemoration of the Anniversary 25th of KnoSys we present a bibliometric analysis of the scientific content of the journal during the period 1991-2014. This analysis shows the conceptual evolution of the journal and some of its performance bibliometric indicators based on citations, as the evolution of its impact factor, its h-index, and its most cited authors/documents. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: 25 years at Knowledge-Based Systems: A bibliometric analysis
